books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt
books.description: A practical guide to programming best practices.

books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: Even bad code can function. But clean code is a joy to read.

books.title: You Don’t Know JS Yet
books.author: Kyle Simpson
books.description: Deep dive into the core mechanisms of the JavaScript language.

books.title: Eloquent JavaScript
books.author: Marijn Haverbeke
books.description: A modern introduction to programming using JavaScript.

books.title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
books.author: Douglas Crockford
books.description: Unearths the elegant parts of JavaScript.

books.title: Refactoring
books.author: Martin Fowler
books.description: Improving the design of existing code without changing its behavior.

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms
books.author: Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, Stein
books.description: The bible of algorithms and data structures.

books.title: The Art of Computer Programming
books.author: Donald Knuth
books.description: A comprehensive monograph on computer programming algorithms.

books.title: Head First Design Patterns
books.author: Eric Freeman & Elisabeth Robson
books.description: A brain-friendly guide to design patterns.

books.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
books.author: Harold Abelson
books.description: A foundational text for computer science.

books.title: Algorithms to Live By
books.author: Brian Christian
books.description: The computer science of human decisions.

books.title: Code
books.author: Charles Petzold
books.description: The hidden language of computer hardware and software.

books.title: Working Effectively with Legacy Code
books.author: Michael Feathers
books.description: How to safely make changes in tangled legacy systems.
